div.p: (Translation: P. L. Bat. 25.26) Stotoetis, son of Harpagathes, grandson of Harpagathes, to Diogas, greetings. I acknowledge having received from you as a loan two hundred silver drachmas, totals dr. 200, which I shall repay whenever it is required. If I should not repay according to what has been written, I shall pay as a fine ....
